entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 02:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -11.4°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Snow squalls near midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 5 cm except locally 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:40 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
